caption:
“The modern saint still walks.”

Reflection:
Holiness keeps pace with the present. The timeless heart beats beneath modern skin.

Commentary:
This reflection celebrates contemporary sanctity. Saints are not relics of the past — they walk among us, clothed in today’s grace.
